ComicInfo.Title: The Hell-Bound Hero!
ComicInfo.Summary:
Roxanne is seduced by a satanic offer. In his Ghost Rider form, Johnny Blaze discovers a vulnerability that may possess his soul.
Ghost Rider encounters "Friend", a Jesus-like Messiah feature. He was later retconned to be one of the forms of Mephisto.
